name: ng2-syntax
description: production ready Angular 2 complient syntax for angularjs

scripts.version: npm run release && git add --force dist/ && git add package.json
scripts.postversion: git rm -r dist/ && git commit -m 'CLEAN AFTER RELEASE'
scripts.link: npm run build && jspm link github:noelmace/angularjs-decorators@dev -y
scripts.bundle: concurrently "jspm bundle ng2-syntax/* dist/bundle.js" "jspm bundle ng2-syntax/* dist/bundle.min.js --minify"
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run bundle && npm run min

author: Noël Macé <contact@noelmace.com>
